item.title: Agnes add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness, and many of our people need it sorely on these accounts. Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all one's lifetime." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Agnes add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "What is that feeling when you're driving away from people and they recede on the plain till you see their specks dispersing? - it's the too-huge world vaulting us, and it's good-bye. But we lean forward to the next crazy venture beneath the skies." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Agnes add a quote by Rumi Jalalud-Din
item.description: "Travel brings power and love back into your life." -- Rumi Jalalud-Din

item.title: Agnes add a quote by E.A. Bucchianeri
item.description: "Love, like Fortune, favours the bold." -- E.A. Bucchianeri
